title: DDFP 71: Ochocinco, LeBron and LA Sports
itunes:title: DDFP 71: Ochocinco, LeBron and LA Sports
description:
Dave and Rank are joined by NFL.com's Jeff Darlington to discuss Chad Ochocinco taking his talents (or lack thereof) to South Beach, LeBron James' quest for an NBA title and debate what would be the dream matchup for Super Bowl XLVII. Plus, Dameshek hijacks "The Black List" to unearth the new segment "Dead or Alive." 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
